previewArticle.title: Toronto FC vs. Montreal Impact | Canadian Championship Match Preview

recapArticle.title: Toronto FC 1, Montreal Impact 1 | Canadian Championship Match Recap

timelineItems.comment: First Half begins.

timelineItems.name: Francis D. Casimiro
timelineItems.text: Pourquoi pas Pearce à gauche et OUImette dans l'axe? #IMFC

timelineItems.comment: Offside, Toronto FC. Daniel Lovitz tries a through ball, but Dwayne De Rosario is caught offside.

timelineItems.name: Matthias Van Halst
timelineItems.text: 10 minutes, toujours pas d'occasion à #TORvMTL

timelineItems.name: Mauricio Vincello
timelineItems.text: C'est un coup au moral mais restons concentrés ! J'en vois un ou deux au milieu qui perdent beaucoup de ballons. #IMFC

timelineItems.name: Community
timelineItems.text: @CommunityAgency: Thanks to @BacardiCanada we're basically on the pitch! #TFClive http://t.co/YIUK0B8NsA

Dwayne De Rosario (Toronto FC) wins a free kick on the right wing.

timelineItems.name: Mitchell Tierney
timelineItems.text: Interesting decision as looks like Lovitz will take the free kicks. Or this one at least. Assume De Rosario if it is direct. #TFCLive

timelineItems.name: mc79hockey
timelineItems.text: Singing about the Plains of Abraham. #TFCLive

timelineItems.comment: Andrés Romero (Montreal Impact) wins a free kick in the defensive half.
Foul by Daniel Lovitz (Toronto FC).

timelineItems.name: Kurtis Larson
timelineItems.text: Surely IMFC won't keep floating balls to Di Vaio. He's not even interested in challenging Henry for those 50-50s.

timelineItems.name: F.D. Laramée
timelineItems.text: Bon, ben, au moins on ne pourra pas accuser Klopas d'avoir attendu trop longtemps pour faire son premier changement ce soir... #imfc

timelineItems.name: Kurtis Larson
timelineItems.text: This has the feel of everything other than a Cup final ... And with this lineup Nelsen will be fine with that #TFCLive

timelineItems.name: Karin
timelineItems.text: Montreal fans at the #TFC game.

timelineItems.name: Rahul Vaidyanath
timelineItems.text: Doneil Henry needs to regain some confidence and be sure of himself in the 18-yd box; has all the physical tools to succeed in #MLS #TFC

timelineItems.comment: Foul by Andrés Romero (Montreal Impact).
Nick Hagglund (Toronto FC) wins a free kick in the defensive half.

timelineItems.name: Kurtis Larson
timelineItems.text: #TFC is playing with a second-rate lineup tonight with an eye towards the weekend and return leg. What's #IMFC's excuse?

timelineItems.comment: Foul by Hernán Bernardello (Montreal Impact).
Gilberto (Toronto FC) wins a free kick in the attacking half.
Attempt saved. Gilberto (Toronto FC) header from the centre of the box is saved in the bottom left corner. Assisted by Daniel Lovitz.

timelineItems.name: Matthias Van Halst
timelineItems.text: À quelle minute la première occasion du match ??? 15' et toujours rien #TORvMTL

timelineItems.name: Patrick Leduc
timelineItems.text: Sais pas si on s'élève ou s'abaisse au niveau de Toronto. Mais à date, ça s'équivaut 0-0 20' #IMFC

timelineItems.name: Kurtis Larson
timelineItems.text: Rivas is injured AGAIN... He's off two minutes in. Stunning. #IMFC

timelineItems.comment: Delay in match Nelson Rivas (Montreal Impact) because of an injury.

timelineItems.name: Christian Tramontin
timelineItems.text: Wow that was a header and a half #TFClive

timelineItems.comment: Attempt blocked. Gilberto (Toronto FC) right footed shot from outside the box is blocked.
Corner,  Toronto FC. Conceded by Heath Pearce.
Match ends, Toronto FC 1, Montreal Impact 1.

timelineItems.name: Andrew MacDougall
timelineItems.text: As much as a tie is fine with me In league matches but it worries me in cup matches #TFCLive

timelineItems.name: Darren Spurrill
timelineItems.text: Well, that wasn't the desired result. #TFC

timelineItems.name: Randy Narine
timelineItems.text: Well done Doneil Henry, that ought to raise your confidence. #TFC

timelineItems.name: Kurtis Larson
timelineItems.text: Brutal marking from IMFC. Actually... There was zero marking from IMFC. Henry still with a lot to do, and finishes off a corner. 1-0 #TFC

timelineItems.text: Fight in the stands, goal on the field. Let's go #TFClive !

timelineItems.text: That's a foul on Hall. He didn't need to give the extra shove. The ball was out. Silly challenge.

timelineItems.name: Lee Barcomb

timelineItems.name: Patrick Friolet
timelineItems.text: Je tiens à rappeler que Klopas a dit préférer un gaucher sur le flanc gauche. Alors pourquoi Ouimette à gauche et Pearce central ? #IMFC

timelineItems.name: Kurtis Larson
timelineItems.text: Poor giveaway from Gilberto. Still have to appreciate the effort to come back and start an attack with that strip.

timelineItems.comment: Dwayne De Rosario (Toronto FC) hits the bar with a right footed shot from the left side of the box.
Attempt saved. Gilberto (Toronto FC) right footed shot from the centre of the box is saved in the centre of the goal.
Offside, Toronto FC. Ashtone Morgan tries a through ball, but Gilberto is caught offside.

timelineItems.name: Mitchell Tierney
timelineItems.text: What a way that would have been for Gilberto to score his first at TFC. Unfortunately it once again wasn't to be. #TFCLive

timelineItems.comment: Foul by Nick Hagglund (Toronto FC).
Andrés Romero (Montreal Impact) wins a free kick in the defensive half.

timelineItems.name: Rudi Schuller
timelineItems.text: IMFC are a dumpster fire at the back, but decent going forward. #canChamp

timelineItems.name: Michael Cacho
timelineItems.text: For every penalty kick Doneil Henry concedes, he eventually scores to make it up for it. #TFClive

timelineItems.name: dave hodgkiss
timelineItems.text: I believe Caldwell simply likes the texture of the soccer ball #TFClive

timelineItems.name: Nick Sabetti
timelineItems.text: Clear handball in the box not called against Toronto. And it did seem like Petrescu saw that one. Impact bench absolutely livid #TFC #IMFC

timelineItems.name: Eric
timelineItems.text: Ça va mieux sans Felipe. #IMFC

timelineItems.name: Rudi Schuller
timelineItems.text: As I said. #canChamp

timelineItems.name: Olivier Tremblay
timelineItems.text: Qui d'autre?

timelineItems.name: Impact de Montréal
timelineItems.text: 73’ MAPP!!!!! Hey @J_Klinsmann did you see this? #IMFClive

timelineItems.name: DiD
timelineItems.text: MMMMMMAAAAAPPPPPPIIIIIIIILLLLLLLOOOOOOOONNNNN #IMFC

timelineItems.name: Rosemary Rago
timelineItems.text: Impact have been pressing all half. All important away goal for MTL. An excellent strike from Mapp w/the their 1st shot on target #canchamp

timelineItems.name: bishopvillered
timelineItems.text: Justin Mapp - that guy is quality. The fact he can't get a sniff with #USMNT shows the gap in quality we face. #IMFC #TFC

timelineItems.name: Jon Wiseman
timelineItems.text: #TFC...you had one job, and that was not to concede an away goal...

timelineItems.name: dave hodgkiss
timelineItems.text: Why sit back and defend at home in the first leg? #TFClive attack!!!

timelineItems.name: Élisabeth
timelineItems.text: Mapp est écoeurant dans une équipe nulle. Imaginons dans une équipe qui se tient. Messi irait se rhabiller! #IMFC

timelineItems.comment: Foul by Hernán Bernardello (Montreal Impact).
Bradley Orr (Toronto FC) wins a free kick in the defensive half.

timelineItems.name: Toronto Gooner
timelineItems.text: We give the ball away so often, and so cheaply. Really amateur at times #TFCLive

timelineItems.name: Matthias Van Halst
timelineItems.text: Nakajima-Farran aurait été très utile à Toronto ce soir #TORvMTL

timelineItems.name: Jaybler
timelineItems.text: Apparently bringing on a defender when you need a goal is the better option. #TFClive

timelineItems.name: Lori Ewing
timelineItems.text: Yeah, so the Montreal Impact's goal was their only shot on net in this game. Still 9 mins plus injury time to go.#TFC

timelineItems.comment: Foul by Hassoun Camara (Montreal Impact).
Ashtone Morgan (Toronto FC) wins a free kick on the left wing.

timelineItems.name: Nick
timelineItems.text: Justin Mapp should be voted in to play in this year's @mlsallstars #IMFC #DeservesChance

timelineItems.name: marcom
timelineItems.text: Bradley Defoe wud have killed #IMFC

timelineItems.comment: Gilberto (Toronto FC) wins a free kick in the attacking half.
Foul by Wandrille Lefevre (Montreal Impact).
Attempt missed. Dwayne De Rosario (Toronto FC) right footed shot from outside the box is too high from a direct free kick.

timelineItems.name: Sam Woodbeck
timelineItems.text: What a waste by De Rosario. #TFCLive

timelineItems.comment: Offside, Toronto FC. Dwayne De Rosario tries a through ball, but Ashtone Morgan is caught offside.

timelineItems.name: Ryan Brister
timelineItems.text: This second half hasn't been good enough from #TFC Simple as that.

timelineItems.name: mephistau
timelineItems.text: Voyons donc, je peux pas croire que Defoe va se fatiguer en jouant 5-10 min. #IMFC C'est bien plus fatiguant de pratiquer.

timelineItems.comment: Attempt missed. Gilberto (Toronto FC) header from the centre of the box misses to the right. Assisted by Daniel Lovitz with a cross.
Hand ball by Dwayne De Rosario (Toronto FC).

timelineItems.name: DAG
timelineItems.text: How much do goals cost? I'd like to buy Gilberto one. #TFC #TFClive

timelineItems.name: Sofiane Benzaza
timelineItems.text: Is this the game that will ignite this famous #TFC #imfc that is waiting to happen ?

timelineItems.comment: Attempt saved. Bradley Orr (Toronto FC) left footed shot from outside the box is saved in the top centre of the goal. Assisted by Dwayne De Rosario.

timelineItems.name: Patrick Friolet
timelineItems.text: Très solide 2ème mi-temps et but à l'étranger important #IMFC

timelineItems.name: Felipe Ponce
timelineItems.text: Cette blessure à Rivas, c’est la saison d’IMFC dans un microcosme #ImpactTVASports #IMFC

timelineItems.comment: Daniel Lovitz (Toronto FC) wins a free kick in the defensive half.
Foul by Andrés Romero (Montreal Impact).

timelineItems.name: Guy Bolduc
timelineItems.text: Lefebvre me fait toujours peur. Pas prêt pour la MLS encore. #IMFC #ImpactTVASports

timelineItems.name: Élisabeth
timelineItems.text: On peut donner le MVP tour de suite a Mapp #IMFC

timelineItems.name: Tom
timelineItems.text: #TFCLive once Gilberto scores his first surely more will quickly follow. Has always been a streaky scorer

timelineItems.name: Maxime Bélanger
timelineItems.text: J'ai bien aimé la performance de @karlouimette sur la gauche ce soir ! #ImpactTVASports #NHL15Subban #IMFC

timelineItems.comment: Attempt missed. Marco Di Vaio (Montreal Impact) header from the centre of the box misses to the left. Assisted by Andrés Romero with a cross.

timelineItems.name: Mauricio Vincello
timelineItems.text: Non Marco comment tu peux rater ça ?! #IMFC

timelineItems.name: Shawn Richardson
timelineItems.text: I like that we are still trying to score, not just playing for a tie. #imfc #babysteps

timelineItems.name: Danny Girard
timelineItems.text: Ok Romero, I'll give you credit. You're playing a good game TONIGHT. #IMFC

timelineItems.comment: Second Half ends, Toronto FC 1, Montreal Impact 1.

timelineItems.name: Jaybler
timelineItems.text: Defoe must be hurt. It's the ONLY logical reason he didn't get into this game. But then why even put him on the bench? #TFClive

timelineItems.name: Patrick Friolet
timelineItems.text: Probablement le meilleur match de Romero dans l'uniforme de l'Impact ce soir #IMFC

timelineItems.name: Olivier Tremblay
timelineItems.text: Montréal fait la meilleure opération. Hâte de voir les XI des deux équipes ce week-end pour me forger une opinion en vue de mercredi.

timelineItems.name: Oz Ghent
timelineItems.text: After watching #IMFC play #FCed for two legs, I'm extremely disappointed that #TFC could only manage a tie tonight. #TFClive #VCup

timelineItems.comment: Offside, Toronto FC. Doneil Henry tries a through ball, but Dwayne De Rosario is caught offside.
